thread.title: Krauthammer: Clinton's contradictory statements on private server may not hurt her in long run
thread.title_full: Krauthammer: Clinton's contradictory statements on private server may not hurt her in long run | Fox News

author: FoxNews.com
title: Krauthammer: Clinton's contradictory statements on private server may not hurt her in long run
text:
Published October 05,
Charles Krauthammer told viewers Monday on “Special Report with Bret Baier” that Hillary Clinton’s contradictory statements on why she used a private server as secretary of state may not hurt her in the long run.
Krauthammer, a syndicated columnist and Fox News contributor explained that Clinton counts on public not following her email stories in great detail.
“What she is counting on, which I think it actually works, is that the public is not going to follow each of these statements,” Krauthammer said
